channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [SGP1][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 050920
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 5, 01:00 - 03:00 UTC

Jul 9, 00:08 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled in the rack 050920.

Start time : 05/08/2025 01:00 UTC
End time : 05/08/2025 03:00 UTC
Service impact : Public netwok will be temporarily unavailable during 2 hours for servers located in the specified rack.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SGP][Virtual Private Servers] - Network maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 29, 07:00 - 09:00 UTC

Jul 10, 18:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the VPS region SGP.

Start time : 29/07/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 29/07/2025 09:00 UTC
Service impact : The network of all VPS located in the region SGP will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure.


Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX/SBG][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jul 16, 04:30 - 10:00 UTC

Jun 30, 17:49 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 16/07/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 16/07/2025 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Dedicated Servers] - Rack R807R01 incident notification
item.description:
Jul 14, 02:08 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our has been resolved.

Start time : 13/07/2025 20:42 UTC
End time : 14/07/2025 02:06 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 13, 21:17 UTC
Identified - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jul 13, 20:55 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the rack R807R01.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 13/07/2025 20:42 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : vRack network is temporarily unavailable on the specified rack.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers via vRack network located on the specified rack.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Racks G124A02 to G124A19 incident notification
item.description:

End time : 14/07/2025 01:24 UTC

Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access their servers via the vRack network located on the specified racks.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 50D32
item.description:
Jul 12, 20:06 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on the rack 50D32 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 12/07/2025 17:48 UTC
End time : 12/07/2025 20:01 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jul 12, 18:12 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offering on the rack 50D32.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 12/07/2025 17:48 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the rack 50D32 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their servers located on the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
